venue.address_2: ( 1 block from Kenmore Square toward Brookline)
venue.name: RISQUE at An Tua Nua

item.description:
Hi Guys! It's been quite some time since our last meetup event! Our apologies. We have been quite busy, so please bear with us.

We thought we'd try it this time at one of the regular salsa spots. There will be a rueda classes with JAM'NASTICS and Salsa Classes with Johnny of Salsa y Control and Kelly. Feel free to attend the classes for only $2 more, or join us for the party for only $10.

Special Notice! There WILL be a performance by Masacote Dance Company, which will be debuting the latest choreography this evening, never seen before! (There was a mistake in Olaf's last newsletter which originally stated it would take place on Valentine's Day.)

The schedule is included below. Hope to see you guys there!

Ana & the Salsa Meetup Staff :)


8pm: Casino Rueda Lessons with Jam'Nastics, all levels
9pm: Salsa with Johnny and Kelly, beginner and intermediate levels
10pm-1am: Salsa Dance with DJ Hernan, DJ D. Martinez, DJ Ricardo, and guest DJ's

Visit the SalsaBoston Site to get a $2 off the evening coupon or get more Info about An Tua Nua!
www.salsaboston.com/antuanua


More Info about Masacote Dance Company (Evening Performance)
www.masacoteentertainment.com

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: An Tua Nua Wednesdays
